Akari Uemura of Juice-Juice and Shiori Nishida of Beyonce Subway present Halo! It's time to say goodbye.
Here is an announcement.
PROJECT 2023 SUMMER CITY CIRCUIT is now underway.
We have only the Tachikawa Stage Garden on September 2 and 3 to go.
We really had a lot of fun memories in this tour, and we would like to run through it until the end.
Juice-Juice will also be going on an autumn tour starting September 23.
We are a group that really loves to perform live, so it is a great blessing to be able to do so many solo tours like this.
Beyonce will be performing overseas for the first time at the Thailand Japan Iconic Music Festival 023 on September 23.
